channel.title: [Emulous] Bank Size + Items [Emulous]
channel.description:
Hey, I'm trying to make a 317 that only loads 317 Items and objects.
What is the higher Item ID that was avalible in a 317
[code=java]public static final int ITEM_LIMIT = 25000; // Item ID Limit.[/code]
Because it obviously isn't 25,000.
[code=java]public static final int BANK_SIZE = 200;[/code]
Also, what was the max bank size in a 317. Because it obviously isn't 200.

item.title: [Emulous] Bank Size + Items [Emulous]

item.title: [Emulous] Bank Size + Items [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Honestly, the item limit has nothing to do with the revision. That controls the maximum amount of models the source actually recognizes.
For the bank size I can’t help you there, use a search engine.

Read full topic
